newsitem.title: FRANCE: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde Aug 23.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde Aug 23.

text.p: These are leading stories in Friday's afternoon daily Le Monde, dated Aug 24.

-- Authorities use force to evict 300 Africans on hunger strike from Paris church. They were there in 50-day protest to renew or obtain work and residence permits. Charter flight said ready to fly some of the Africans out of the country on Saturday morning.
-- French and German governments pleased with interest rate cuts but franc still vulnerable due to weak growth and potential for social unrest.
-- Airbus picks up $900 million order from United Airlines.
-- Bank of France declines to say at what time it learnt of Thursday's German interest rate cut.
